nodes.text: This pin-up of a soldier was a decorative poster available in the galaxy during the Clone Wars. It showed an attractive, Human female in battle gear, holding a blaster in each hand.

This image was painted by Justin Ridge, and was developed for The Clone Wars episode Rookies. In the episode, it can be seen gracing the walls in Rishi Station. The poster can also be seen in Christophsis Republic base in The Hidden Enemy, in Cliffhold in Mystery of a Thousand Moons, and Moshi Bar and Hondo Ohnaka's pirate outpost in Lethal Trackdown.
